DEFAULT: Don't remove Kerbals from a pod I specifically choose for missions just because I move or replace a part. Can I just say? So. Annoying. (I know you can turn this off but this should just be default OFF since it is seriously so annoying to go from Launch to VAB just to move a Kerbal)

DEFAULT: When I IVA a Kerbal, most of the time I just want to see what they see. For fun. Why must the game immediately assume that I want to "control from here"? If I want to control from here, I will right click and choose that option. This is really annoying and makes me scurred to IVA during burns because then my ships thinks it is going the wrong direction from the node.

I know there are more important gameplay fixes that should/need to happen but these are just two of my peeves.
